description:
Cozy , fully furnished for the comfortable stay 1 bd 1 bth apt located in the safe and quite area in Brooklyn, New York, 5 min walk to the F or N train, 45 minutes to Time Square; 35 min from downtown Manhattan World Financial Wi Fi, AC Elevator, Safe parking on the street, Restaurants , Yoga studio, Food shopping within walking distance. Brighton Beach 15 minutes away. Sunny and roomy apartment for the perfect stay for family with kids or friends to enjoy New York.

The apartment is sunny and spacious.  You could not find better for this price. The area is quite, so you will be able to get the good rest after exploring the city. The apartment is very well taken care of. It is located convenient, close to everything you might need, and mainly to transportation. The apartment is one bedroom. However, the rooms are not connected. There are silver, plates, pots and everything you might need in the kitchen. I will provide you lines, bath towels, the complimentary pass to the Metropolitan Museum for up 8 people and access to the “Free in New York” events membership website to make your stay in New York even more enjoyable. I also might be able to help you to get some discount tickets to Broadway shows, opera and museums.

You will have the access to the whole apartment

You will be able to reach me anytime by phone. I also will be available to take of any of your needs within couple hours

Brooklyn is the unique and diverse neighborhood which has the nice vibe. The apartment is located in the Bensonhurst area, originally Italian neighborhood, now very diverse including Russian, Jewish and Asian population. You easily can find nice restaurants couple blocks away. Food shopping very convenient, just two block away. You could be in the broad walk near the ocean or visit the aquarium (great for kids!) within 15 minutes by train or 10 minutes drive. Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanical Garden and Zoo are 20 minutes drive.

F and N train lines can take you at any part in Brooklyn or Manhattan . F train two blocks away and N train three blocks, very short walking distance .

When I moved to New work , it was important for me to find the safe and quite space still close to everything. This is apartment is perfectly fits my requirements, hope your too. You could walk on the street very late night. And still be in the Central Park in less than an hour.
name: Cozy and comfy, spacious convenient 1 bd sleep 4+
review: Если хотите ощутить советскую квартиру То это как раз именно то. Каждый выбирает конечно что ему по душе... Но лично нашей группе прибывающей в этой квартире не понравилось.С другой стороны не хочу чтоб хозяйка расстраивалась  у каждого своё представление что такое уют.
